post:
HostSailor has established itself as a trusted provider of high quality VPS Hosting, Dedicated servers, Domains, and SSL Certificates with top notch support and impeccable reputation and also offers some of the most competitive pricing, without sacrificing on the quality of the products and services.HostSailor is based in Dubai, UAE and the services are

physically located in Netherlands (Capelle & Amsterdam) and Romania (Bucharest). We own our infrastructure which includes switches/routers/IP addresses/servers, and all servers are HP/DELL/Supermicro, we do not resell any of our services.
Operating systems: ( CentOS, Debian, Fedora, Scientific, Suse, Ubuntu and Windows ) If we don't have it, we can install it for you! or

you can request us to mount your own image/ISO.

Discounts: 50% OFF Using Coupon Code: RONL50VE

1 month = 50% onetime discount
3 months = 50% onetime discount + 5% recurring / total of 55% off
6 months = 50% onetime discount + 10% recurring / total of 60% off
12 months = 50% onetime discount + 15% recurring / total of 65% off
